product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Mystique 1 Floor Saver Tent Footprint - Special Buy
long_description: The Mystique 1 Floor Saver tent footprint from ALPS Mountaineering protects the bottom of your Mystique 1 tent, or similarly-sized tents. Designed just a tad smaller than the tent floor, it's the perfect size to prevent pooling of water under the tent during rainy weather. Comes in stuff sack with drawcord and toggle closure. Measures 94 x 42 in. and weighs 7 oz. Special buy.
short_description: The Mystique 1 Floor Saver tent footprint from ALPS Mountaineering protects the bottom of your Mystique 1 tent, or similarly-sized tents.
